Chapter List Endpoint

GET api.quran-tafseer.com/quran

Description

Simple API endpoint to get a list of Quran chapters, the index can be use in other endpoints.

Response body

Verse Details Endpoint

GET api.quran-tafseer.com/quran/{sura_number}/{ayah_number}

Description

API endpoint to get a text for specific Verse in Sura, you should pass Sura number and Ayah number in URI.

Response body

                    
{
    "sura_index": 1,
    "sura_name": "الفاتحة",
    "ayah_number": 1,
    "text": "بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَنِ الرَّحِيمِ"
}

Tafseer List Endpoint

GET api.quran-tafseer.com/tafseer

Description

Simple API endpoint to get a list of Quran tafseer avaliable in Tafseer API, the id can be use in other endpoints.

Response body

                    
[
    {
        "id": 1,
        "name": "التفسير الميسر"
    },
    {
        "id": 2,
        "name": "تفسير الجلالين"
    }
]

Verse Tafseer Endpoint

GET api.quran-tafseer.com/tafseer/{tafseer_id}/{sura_number}/{ayah_number}

Description

API endpoint to get a tafseer specific tasfeer for verse in chapter, you should pass Tafseer Id which can get from Tafseer List Endpoint, Sura number, and Ayah number in URI.

Response body

                    
[
    {
        "id": 1,
        "name": "التفسير الميسر"
    },
    {
        "id": 2,
        "name": "تفسير الجلالين"
    }
]
